statements: SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT alert_type, description FROM alerts WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT alert_type FROM alerts;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(alert_id) AS alert_count FROM alerts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING alert_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, alert_type, description FROM alerts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT alert_type, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM alerts GROUP BY alert_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_type, description, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, timestamp, NOW()) AS time_difference FROM alerts WHERE alert_type LIKE '%Failure%' ORDER BY time_difference ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE balance > 100;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'payment';
SELECT customer_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN alerts ON customers.customer_id = alerts.customer_id
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(alert_id) FROM alerts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(alert_id) > 3
SELECT * FROM customer_alerts ORDER BY alert_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM customer_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Priority';
SELECT alert_type, alert_message, alert_time FROM customer_alerts WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM balances WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_alerts ORDER BY alert_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM customer_alerts WHERE alert_type='High Priority';
SELECT customer_id, account_type, balance FROM balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, alert_type, alert_time FROM customer_alerts WHERE alert_type='Urgent' ORDER BY alert_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(balance_amount) AS total_balance FROM customers JOIN balances ON customers.customer_id = balances.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, activity_description FROM customers JOIN activities ON customers.customer_id = activities.customer_id WHERE activity_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT customers.customer_name, balances.balance_amount, activities.activity_description FROM customers JOIN balances ON customers.customer_id = balances.customer_id JOIN activities ON customers.customer_id = activities.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, message FROM alerts WHERE recipient_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, email, balance FROM customers WHERE account_status = 'active';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_type, reminder_date, reminder_message FROM payment_reminders WHERE reminder_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE account_status = 'Active' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_transaction DESC;
SELECT reminder_date, reminder_type, reminder_message FROM payment_reminders WHERE reminder_type = 'Payment Due' ORDER BY reminder_date;
SELECT log_type, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM activity_logs GROUP BY log_type ORDER BY log_count DESC;
